content: Can you describe the project a bit more?
Okay, I'm implementing a button that triggers an alert.

In the conversation, the user requested changes to their website, specifically to change all text to black. They also asked for the 'shop now' button to alert again when pressed, with the message 'shopping now!'. The AI confirmed it would make this adjustment. Additionally, the user was presented with various optional features to implement, including adding a customer testimonials section and integrating social media sharing buttons, among others. The user responded positively to updating the alert for the 'shop now' button and indicated they would prefer a simple popup alert. They also requested a textbox to include informative content about water bottles. Throughout the conversation, the AI acknowledged the user's requests and provided options related to the implementation of features, such as the content for the textbox and its positioning on the landing page.
Add a button that alerts when the user presses it

{"status": "success", "qna": [{"question 1": "What specific message would you like the alert to display when the 'Shop Now' button is clicked?", "option1": "'Shopping now!'", "option2": "'Get ready to shop!'"}, {"question 2": "Would you like the alert to have any specific styling or additional functionality, such as a confirmation box?", "option1": "Yes, I want a styled confirmation box.", "option2": "No, just a regular alert box is fine."}], "input_token_count": 562, "output_token_count": 109, "time_taken": "0:00:01.458861"}
Okay, I'll get started on fixing the shop now alerting.

{"status": "success", "qna": [{"question 1": "Would you like to change the text color for all sections of the landing page or only specific sections?", "option1": "All sections", "option2": "Specific sections (please specify)"}, {"question 2": "Do you want to keep the current background color, or would you like to change that as well to better match the black text?", "option1": "Keep current background", "option2": "Change background color"}], "input_token_count": 454, "output_token_count": 104, "time_taken": "0:00:01.482531"}
Sure, I'll make all the text black.
